product_name: Hammer Nutrition Recoverite Drink Mix - 32 Servings
long_description: Make sure today's great workout doesn't become tomorrow's agony! Use Hammer Nutrition Recoverite(TM) after your workout to minimize post-exercise muscle soreness. Contains whey protein and maltodextrin, which is a complex carbohydrate that provides rapid metabolism to help rebuild muscle tissue. Electrolyte-enhanced formula helps replenish essential mineral levels in the body. Amino acid glutamine can help the health of muscles and the performance of your immune system and digestive tract. Mix 2 scoops in 8 - 12 fl. oz. of cold water and consume immediately after completing your workout; supplies 30g of complex carbs, 10g of whey protein and 3g of glutamine. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Make sure today's great workout doesn't become tomorrow's agony! Use Hammer Nutrition Recoverite(TM) after your workout to minimize post-exercise muscle soreness.
